title: Champions League power rankings: Who moves up and down after first week of action?
text:
The Champions League has returned, with the first 16 games of this year’s competition done and dusted with the first week of action concluded.

Defending champions Liverpool FC fell to defeat in Napoli to get their defence off to a poor start, while FC Barcelona could only take a point from their trip to face Borussia Dortmund.

PSG laid down an early marker with a fine victory over Real Madrid and it is as you were for Atletico Madrid and Juventus – a 2-2 draw at the Wanda Metropolitano.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Salzburg sizzled, Atalanta were awful and Manchester City proved you don’t have to have fit centre-backs to win against Shakhtar Donetsk.

Here are our updated Champions League power rankings:

Shape Created with Sketch. Power rankings: Champions League group stage Show all 33 left Created with Sketch. right Created with Sketch. Shape Created with Sketch.
